channel.title: ~Weird Error~
channel.description:
:mad: :( :| :confused: :eek: PROBLEM :eek: :confused: :| :( :mad:
Hello,
I fixed my last problem sorta, well just worked around it, but know I have this problem on my Runserver-------
(1st Problem) ----------------------------------------------------- .\Java\client\.java:1 class, interface, or enum expected cd c:\javaimport java.io.*;
.\Java\client\.java:1 illegal character: \92 cd c:\javaimport java.io.*;
2 errors ------------------------------------------------------------
Ok thats my first problem, basically I downloaded a source and switch the default name in the client.java to the username that I use.
Also,
(2nd Problem)
When I try to log into my server, it sometimes says "No response from server, try a different world" Whats up with this?
Thanks heaps for you help (*once again lol)
:) Hmpph
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 09:13:32 PM[/size][hr]Anyone there?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 11:16:45 PM[/size][hr]C'mon dudes
